show-height.description: Content beyond this height will display the Expand Full Text button, in rpx
show-height.description_zh: 内容超出此高度才会显示展开全文按钮，单位rpx

toggle.description: Whether to display the collapse button when expanded
toggle.description_zh: 展开后是否显示收起按钮

font-size.description: The size of the prompt text, in rpx

color.description: The color of the hint text

shadow-style.description: Custom handling of shadows, object form
shadow-style.description_zh: 对阴影的自定义处理，对象形式

text-indent.description: The number of characters to be indented in the first line of a paragraph should be set to 0 without indentation
text-indent.description_zh: 段落首行缩进的字符个数，无需缩进请设置为0

index.description: It is used to return as a callback parameter in the open and close events
index.description_zh: 用于在open和close事件中当作回调参数返回

events.name: open
events.description: Triggered when the content is expanded
